references.paper_title: SuperGlue: Learning feature matching with graph neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces a transformer-based approach to feature matching, which is a key technique used in the proposed framework.

references.paper_title: ROMA: Revisiting robust losses for dense feature matching
references.reason: This paper proposes a dense matching method that is used as one of the base models in the proposed pre-training framework.

references.paper_title: Efficient LoFTR: Semi-dense local feature matching with sparse-like speed
references.reason: This paper proposes a semi-dense matching method that is used as one of the base models in the proposed pre-training framework.

references.paper_title: Depth Anything: Unleashing the power of large-scale unlabeled data
references.reason: This paper introduces a monocular depth estimation network that is used for generating synthetic cross-modal image pairs.

references.paper_title: Unpaired image-to-image translation using cycle-consistent adversarial networks
references.reason: This paper introduces an image style translation network that is used for generating synthetic cross-modal image pairs.
